kw.name: Open Mailbox
kw.doc: Open IMAP email client session to given ``host`` with given ``user`` and ``password``.

kw.name: Wait For Email
kw.doc: Wait for email message to arrived base on any given filter criteria. Returns email index of the latest email message received.

kw.name: Get Links From Email
kw.doc: Returns all links found in the email body from given ``email_index``.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Close Mailbox
kw.doc: Close IMAP email client session.
